name: Picross e8
overview: The newest version of the series, with all the functions of previous titles! The 8th game in the Picross e series with over 500,000 downloads worldwide. It retains all the functions of Picross e7, with all new puzzles. Enjoy Picross in a comfortable play environment refined from all the previous series. Picross is a "Picture Crossword Puzzle Game" where numbers act as hints to complete images. The rules are simple and easy to grasp. Anyone can do it!
